title: SingerMessage
description: This is a compromise. Java codegen doesn't support union types. So we need to just make a flat json schema that looks like at of the possible permutations of a singer message. See the description for each field to see which message type that field belongs to.

type.description: record, schema, and state message: used to determine record type. used in all singer messages.

stream.description: record AND schema message: name of stream

record.description: record message: no schema, just a map of string to object!

value.description: state message: no schema, just a map of string to object!
